author: pharaohh
msg: Enhanced Session DAO more ehcache work - using sensible defaults, tested w/ overflow to disk

author: pharaohh
msg: Enhanced Session DAO implementation & updated ehcache session settings to prevent preemptive cache timeout (interfering w/ JSecurity's session timeout)

author: pharaohh
msg: Added more robust disk-based session management via a SessionDAO implementation using Ehcache (in memory + disk-based cache & persistant across server restarts).  This is now the default SessionDAO for the DefaultSessionManager, as it is production-worthy.

author: pharaohh
msg: Added more robust disk-based session management via a SessionDAO implementation using Ehcache (in memory + disk-based cache & persistant across server restarts).  This is now the default SessionDAO for the DefaultSessionManager, as it is production-worthy.
